entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9543] Resultado global with a value of 19,244,000 is not equal to the combined total of Ganancia (pérdida) and Otro resultado global ( 18,463,000 + -781,000 ) with a value of 17,682,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Resultado global : -3 Decimals of Ganancia (pérdida) : -3 Decimals of Otro resultado global : -3
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.zip/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es/reports/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.xhtml 10771

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of -249,879,000 reported in the network role http://metrovacesa.com/xbrl/2021/roles/EstadoDeSituacionFinancieraResumen should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 249,879,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://metrovacesa.com/xbrl/2021/roles/EstadoDeCambiosEnElPatrimonioNetoResumen. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.zip/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es/reports/959800ZQW44V5U3SEZ73-2021-12-31-es.xhtml 10771
